title: [Dark Tower, Study]
description: Bookshelves, rising high overhead, are filled with tomes in all sizes and colors of leather bindings.  Moonlight streaming through tall, narrow windows casts thin bands of silvery light on a carved modwir desk and its matching chair.  Nestled among the stacks is an immense hearth wrought of rough local stone, and stretching between a winding staircase and an ironwood door is a modwir credenza.

Bookshelves, rising high overhead, are filled with tomes in all sizes and colors of leather bindings.  Sunlight streaming through tall, narrow windows casts thin bands of light on a carved modwir desk and its matching chair.  Nestled among the stacks is an immense hearth wrought of rough local stone, and stretching between a winding staircase and an ironwood door is a modwir credenza.
room.location: the Dark Tower, outside the glacier-locked town of Icemule Trace
